definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: He escaped being killed when the magazine exploded because he had not gone to work.
sentences.chinese: 他因沒有去上班而避免了在那次彈藥庫爆炸中喪生。

sentences.english: The fort was divided into three layers, and an ammunition house and a barrack were set under the ground.
sentences.chinese: 炮臺上下分三層，地下建有彈藥庫和兵舍。

sentences.english: We'll have to make a dash for it before the fire reaches that ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須在大火燒到彈藥庫前衝過去。
